plays.text: Goal scored by Ales Hemsky (Backhand 8 ft) assisted by Ryan Whitney and Magnus Paajarvi
Goal scored by Alex Tanguay (Wristshot 21 ft) assisted by Matt Stajan and Robyn Regehr
Penalty to Tim Jackman 2 minutes for Elbowing Ladislav Smid
Penalty to Steve Staios 2 minutes for Tripping Andrew Cogliano
Penalty to Gilbert Brule 2 minutes for Slashing Curtis Glencross
Penalty to Tom Gilbert 2 minutes for Tripping Steve Staios
Goal scored by Dustin Penner (Snapshot 24 ft) assisted by Sam Gagner
Penalty to Brendan Morrison 2 minutes for Boarding Ladislav Smid
Goal scored by Brendan Morrison (Wristshot 17 ft) assisted by Matt Stajan and Cory Sarich
Goal scored by Magnus Paajarvi (Slapshot 7 ft) assisted by Colin Fraser and Ryan Jones
Penalty to Jordan Eberle 2 minutes for Hooking Niklas Hagman
Goal scored by Niklas Hagman (Wristshot 11 ft) assisted by Brendan Morrison and Olli Jokinen
Penalty to Tom Gilbert 2 minutes for Interference Matt Stajan
Penalty to Curtis Glencross 2 minutes for Cross checking Tom Gilbert
Penalty to Ladislav Smid 2 minutes for Holding Olli Jokinen
Power Play Goal Scored by Jarome Iginla (Wristshot 12 ft) assisted by Alex Tanguay and Mark Giordano
Penalty to Ian White 2 minutes for Hooking Taylor Hall
Goal scored by Alex Tanguay (Wristshot 26 ft) (Empty Net) assisted by Jarome Iginla and Matt Stajan
